title: Custom Scaling Toggle
name: devpixelsperpx-toggle-custom
description: This addon allows you to quickly toggle between an interface zoom level of yor choice and the default.
author: Roope Salmi

preferences.name: value
preferences.title: Scaling amount
preferences.description: Define the amount to scale the UI when enabled. A setting of one means default scaling.

preferences.name: enabled
preferences.title: Enable or disable scaling
preferences.description: This setting is normally controlled from the toggle button.
